dmca.title: Costumes4less Requests Removal
dmca.body:
Ladies and Gentlemen:

As required under Sections 512(c)(3) and 512(d)(3) of the Digital Millenium Copyright Act (17 U.S.C. ss512(c)(3) and 512(d)(3)), we are placing you on notice that:

1. At issue is the Costumes4less.com(R) Website Software, text and artwork appearing therein - singly and collectively, the "Costumes4less.com(R) material". Anilta Corporation is the exclusive owner of the copyrights in and to the Costumes4less.com(R) material. Anilta Corporation also holds a registered trademark NUmber 3069351, granted by the United States Patent and Trademark office on March 14, 2006

2. Utilizing the search query, "groupdetail.asp costume," at www.google.com, the Search results in the following  " Infringing Material" containing unauthorized copies of the Costumes4less.com(R) material or unauthorized derivative works of the  Costumes4less.com(R) material

a. http://halloweencostumesale.com/
b. http://www.halloweencostumesale.com/, and
c. any and all urls' subordinate to the http://halloweencostumesale.com/, and
d. any and all urls' subordinate to the http://www.halloweencostumesale.com/.

Please remove or disable all access to the above Infringing Material which infringe the  Costumes4less.com(R) material and the exclusive rights of Anilta Corporation.

3. Should you require any further information regarding this matter, please contact me at the address, telephone number or email address indicated below:
[Private]
President, Anilta Corporation
7625 Rosecrans Avenue #3
Paramount, Ca 90723
Phone [Private]
Email: [Private]@anilta.com

continued to next page
continued from previous page

4. To the best of our knowledge, here is the information of owner/administrator of the allegedly infringing web site "Halloweencostumesale.com"
Name: [Private]
Organization: Star Online Technologies Ltd.
Address: [Private]
City: Mumbai
State: MA
Postal Code: 400020
County: INDIA
Phone: [Private]
Email: [Private]@staronlinetech.com

4. The use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

[Private]
President, Anilta Corporation, a California Corporation
